alert.note: Alert for Livingston; St. John The Baptist; St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:47PM CDT until July 22 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST...WEST CENTRAL ST. TAMMANY... EAST CENTRAL LIVINGSTON AND SOUTHERN TANGIPAHOA PARISHES... At 545 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Springfield to 8 miles west of Madisonville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Report of quarter sized hail near Pontchatoula. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Ponchatoula, Albany, Madisonville, Springfield, Killian and W Lk Pontchartrain Buoy. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 28 and 50. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 13 and 30. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Livingston; St. John The Baptist; St. Tammany
